lemma lookup_add_monom: "get_var_coeff lp v + c \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow> fmlookup (add_monom c v lp) v = Some (get_var_coeff lp v + c)" "get_var_coeff lp v + c = 0 \<Longrightarrow> fmlookup (add_monom c v lp) v = None" "x \<noteq> v \<Longrightarrow> fmlookup (add_monom c v lp) x = fmlookup lp x"
